Style Guidelines for Text on the Site

by: OmneBonum

Here, we are not talking about formatting and fonts. We are talking about the authorial voice of the site.

Using the first person plural

In this draft text, I vacillate between ‘I’ and ‘we.’ Eventually, we need to consistently use ‘we.’ I will use ‘I’ here because this is not text that will be part of the final site.

Limiting allusions

Don’t use, say, a literary reference where plain language will do the trick. For instance, I want to write, “Depending on the influence they wield, some people’s vote is, in essence, larger than others.” But this reminds me of Animal Farm by George Orwell.
